titleStmt.title: Viæ rectæ ad vitam longam, pars secunda VVherein the true vse of sleepe, exercise, excretions, and perturbations is, with their effects, discussed and applied to euery age, constitution of body, and time of yeare. By To: Venner Doctor of Physicke in Bathe.
Via recta ad vitam longam. Part 2
titleStmt.author: Venner, Tobias, 1577-1660.
